effects.display_string:
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Wildfire Bomb by 3% stacking up to 6 times. 
Wildfire Bomb has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends, your next Mongoose Bite deals 400% increased damage and reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Treads of Rekindled Flames

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,811, up to 14,056.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 3 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 19,443 Agility for 15 sec.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have the chance to ignite your target with Radiant Focus for 15 sec. 

After dealing up to 1.9 million damage to the target, the focused energies ignite you with Radiance, granting between 391 to 782 of your highest Secondary stat based on damage dealt for 15 sec.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
